Table.Title: Citrus Honey Chicken Kabobs
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 cup ReaLemon juice 1/4 cup ReaLime juice 1/2 cup orange juice 1/4 cup honey 1 tsp. salt 2 lbs skinless, boneless chicken breasts 4-6 barbecue skewers
Table.Directions:
Cut chicken into 3/4" cubes. Combine liquid ingredients and salt. Mix well. Add chicken and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
Drain chicken and discard marinade. Skewer the chicken cubes. (Optional: alternate chunks of fresh red pepper, onion and mushroom with chicken cubes for a colorful kabob.)
Grill until chicken is fully cooked.

Table.Title: Beef Marinade
Table.Ingredients: 1 cup corn oil 1/4 cup dijon mustard 3/4 cup lite soy sauce 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice 1/4 cup fine chopped onion 3 cloves of garlic, minced 1/4 cup worchester sauce 1/2 tsp pepper 1 London Broil, 1-2" thick
Table.Directions: Grill 1 hr 15 minutes

Table.Title: Fran's Marinade
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 cup soy sauce 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup wine 1/2-1 tsp sweet basil 1/2 tsp garlic 1/2 tsp parsley 1/4 tsp pepper
Table.Directions: Overnight, blend and marinade in NON METAL container.

Table.Title: Emmie's Marinade
Table.Ingredients: 3 lbs chicken 1/2 cup olive oil 1/4 cup lemon juice 2 tbsp white wine vinegar 1 tbsp dry basil leaves 1 tsp lemon peel 2 cloves minced garlic 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 tsp pepper
Table.Directions:
Combine all ingredients except chicken. Pour over chicken in shallow dish.
Turn to coat. Refrigerate 30-45 minutes, turning once to coat. Grill or broil, turning once, 6 minutes to each side.

Table.Title: Creamy Honey Mustard Vinaigrette
Table.Ingredients: 1/4 cup of mayonnaise 2 tbsp honey 2 tbsp stone ground or dijon mustard 1/4 tsp salt 2 tbsp cider vinegar
Table.Directions:
1. In small bowl, combine mayonnaise, honey, mustard and salt; whisk until well blended using Stainless Mini Whish. Add vinegar and whisk until well blended. Cover; refrigerate until ready to use. Store dressing covered in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks.
Yield: 2/3 cup
Tips: Delicious served over a green salad, tossed with toppings such as toasted sliced almonds or chopped pecans, sweetened dried cranberries or golden raisins, mandarin orange segments and sliced green onions.
Can also be used a dip with assorted fresh vegetable dippers, chicken nuggets, or pretzels if desired.

Table.Title: Barbecue Sauce
Table.Ingredients: 3/4 cup brown sugar 1/2 cup ketchup 1/2 cup molasses 1/4 cup cider vinegar 1/4 cup olive oil 3 tbsp prepared mustard 3 cloves garlic 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper 1/4 tsp black ground pepper
Table.Directions:
Combine sugar, ketchup, molasses, vinegar, olive oil, mustard, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, cayenne pepper, and black pepper in blender; cover. Blend until smooth. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Marinate over one pound of beef, chicken or pork, marinate for at least 2 hrs overnight before cooking.

Table.Title: Ms. Judi's Marinade
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 cup oil 1/4 cup lemon juice 1 tsp salt 1 clove minced garlic 1 tsp oregano 1/2 tsp pepper

Table.Title: Marinade
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 cup soy sauce 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup red wine vinegar? 1 tsp oregano 1/2 tsp basil 1/2 tsp garlic powder 1/2 tsp parsley 1/4 tsp pepper

Table.Title: Spinach Quiche
Table.Ingredients: 1 10-inch unbaked pastry shell 1 9 oz. package Seabrook Farms Creamed Spinach 2 teaspoons chopped shallots or onion ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper ¼ teaspoon ground red pepper ¼ teaspoon of nutmeg 4 eggs lightly beaten 1½ cups light cream or half and half ½ cup grated Swiss cheese ¼ cup of crumbled, crisp-cooked bacon
Table.Directions:
Prepare pastry from your favorite recipe or from a package mix according to directions except substitute a dry white wine such as sauterne or Chablis for one-half the liquid. Place in a 10-inch quiche or pie pan; flute edges and prick all over with a fork. Bake at 350°F for 10 minutes or until set but not browned.
While crust bakes, prepare spinach according to package directions. Empty into 1 ½ quart mixing bowel; allow to cool slightly. Stir in shallots or onions, seasoning, eggs, and cream. Pour inoto hot pastry shell and sprinkle with Swiss cheese and crumbled bacon. Back at 350°F for 40 minutes or until sharp knife inserted in center comes out clean. May be browned by placing under broiler for a few minutes, if desired.

Table.Title: Swiss Vegetable Medley
Table.Ingredients: 1 bag of frozen broccoli, cauliflower, carrots thawed and drained (1-2 hours) 1 can cream mushrooms 1 cup shredded Swiss cheese (4 oz) 1/3 cup sour cream ¼ tea pepper 4 oz pimiento French fried onions
Table.Directions:
350°F - 30 mins
Combined vegetables, ½ cup cheese, sour cream, ½ can onions. Pour into casserole, baked covered. Top with remaining cheese and onions. Cook uncovered for 5 mins. Micro cook covered 8 mins high. Top with remaining ingredients. Uncovered 1 min. high.

Table.Title: Broccoli Souffle
Table.Ingredients: 2 – 10oz chop. Broccoli cooked, make in baking dish 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 cup sour cream 2 eggs ½ med minced onion ¾ cup grated cheese
Table.Directions:
350°F : 1 hour
Bake in oven until knife comes out of center clean.

Table.Title: Battered - Dip
Table.Ingredients: 1 egg ½ cup bisquick ¼ cup water salt to taste garlic salt to taste
Table.Directions: Clean and peel eggplant or partially peel zucchini. Then combine.

Table.Title: Parsley Potatoes
Table.Ingredients:
1½ pds red skin potatoes (Peel, strip in middle of potatoes- cold H2O) sauté for 5 mins 1 tablespoon oil 1 med chopped onion 1 small garlic glove (crushed) 1 cup bush parsley (¾ when cooking ¼ on top when done) ½ tea pepper
add: 1 cup chicken broth
Table.Directions: Place potatoes in a single layer and simmer uncovered 10 min. Med-low heat. Last ingredients are parsley and pepper and chicken broth.

Table.Title: Carrots
Table.Ingredients:
carrots
see directions for other ingredients
Table.Directions:
350°F : 20 mins
12 carrots precooked, ¼ to ½ slices, salted H2O ¼ cup margarine melted
add: 1 small chopped onion- tender stir in: ¼ cup flour, 1 tea salt, ¼ tea dry mustard
Add 2 cups milk: cook till smooth
1/8 tea pepper ¼ tea celery salt or 1/8 tea seeds
8 oz grated yellow American or cheedd cheese
alternate layers of carrots, sauce cheese
top with 1/3 cup buttered bread crumbs

Table.Title: Veggie Stir Fry
Table.Ingredients: 1 long piece celery ¼ small cabbage 1 pepper chopped lengthwise 3-4 carrots ½ cup mushrooms ¼ cup green onion 1 tea salt and pepper soy sauce ginger garlic
Table.Directions: Mix all together. Season to taste.

Table.Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Table.Ingredients: 1 pound fresh broccoli 1 tablespoon acceptable margarine 1 tablespoon peanut oil 1 pound carrots, peeled, and thinly sliced ¾ pound mushrooms, thinly sliced 5 medium green onions, thinly sliced 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice 2 tablespoons sherry Freshly ground black pepper to taste 1 teaspoon nutmeg 1 teaspoon thyme
Table.Directions:
Rinse broccoli and trim. Separate florets so they are smaller uniform size. Peel stems and cut into 2-inch lengths. Set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat margarine and oil over medium heat. Add broccoli, carrots, mushrooms, and onions. Cook and stir 5 minuets, or until vegetables are tender-crsip.
Stir in lemon juice, sherry and other seasonings. Serve hot.

Table.Title: Scallop Corn
Table.Ingredients:
1 stick of butter melted mix: 1 cup of sour cream beat: 2 eggs
mix in: 1 can cream style corn 1 can undrained corn 1 package jiffy cornbread mix
Table.Directions: Mix together. Bake at 350°F : 45 mins

Table.Title: Potato Dumplings
Table.Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes in jackets in salted water mash
add: 2 eggs ¼ tea nutmeg ½ tea baking powder 1¾ cup flour 2 tea salt
Table.Directions:
Drop in boiling water, six at a time. 3-5 mins until raise to top. size of golf balls.
fry bread in butter cut in cubes- use crotuns.

Table.Title: Steamed New Potatoes with Garlic Sauce
Table.Ingredients: 8 small or 4 large new potatoes, about 1¼ pounds, unpeeled, scrubbed, and if large cut in half 2 heads garlic 2 teaspoons skim milk 1 teaspoon acceptable vegetable oil 1 teaspoon nonfat butter granules 2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley freshly ground black pepper to taste
Table.Directions: In a medium saucepan, place a steamer basket and add water to a depth of 1-2 inches. Be sure the water does not reach the bottom of the basket. Cover saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Place potatoes in steamer basket. Separate cloves of garlic, but do not peel the paper-thin skins surrounding each clove. Scatter cloves around potatoes. Cover and steam about 20 minuets or until a fork can be easily inserted into potatoes. Remove garlic from pan. Remove skins from garlic cloves by peeling them off with your hands or by pushing the garlic pulp out of the cloves. Discard skins and mash garlic pulp with milk, oil, and butter granules. Remove potatoes from pan and cut them in half. Serve with a dollop of garlic sauce, parsley, pepper.

Table.Title: Marinated Tomatoes
Table.Ingredients:
Combine and stand for 1 hour: 1 tsp. salt ¼ tsp. pepper 1 tsp. basil 1 cup oil 1 tsp. paprika 2 tsp. chives or onions ¼ tsp. crushed garlic
Combine and stand for 10 mins: 1½ tsp water ½ tsp dry mustard
Add 1 table sugar 2 table red vinegar 3 table lemon juice
Table.Directions: Beat till creamy. Marinate 4 large tomatoes 1 hour

Table.Title: Yams & APPLES
Table.Ingredients:
Toss: 2 medium sliced apples 1/3 cup pecans ½ tea cinnamon ½ cup brown sugar
layer 2: 17 oz cans yams dot w/ ¼ margarine cover and cook in 1½ quart casserole
Table.Directions:
350°F : 35-40 mins
Top with marsh mellows Broil till brown.

Table.Title: Sweet Potato Fluff
Table.Ingredients: 6-7 sweet potatoes peeled and cut, cook until tender than mash Add and whip: 4 table flour ½ cup milk ¼ cup brown sugar 1 tea. Nutmeg ¾ tea. Salt ½ tea. Cinnamon 3 oz. – 1 cup of tiny marshmallows
Table.Directions: Greased casserole dish and bake with lid for 15 mins at 350°F. Then remove lid and place marshmallows on top and bake for another 15 mins.

Table.Title: Sweet Potato
Table.Ingredients: 3 lb sweet potatoes mashed 1 cup of sugar 2 eggs 1 tea vanilla 1/3 cup milk ½ cup butter
Table.Directions:
Boil potatoes and mash. Mix in ingredients. Cook in a 2 quart casserole pan. Topping: 1 cup firmly pack brown sugar 1/3 cup flour 1/3 cup butter 1 cup chopped pecans
Cook at 350 for 30 mins

Table.Title: Pasta Salad
Table.Ingredients: 8-12 oz cooked pasta steam 4 mins: 4 oz snowpeas and 2 bgs. Chopped broccoli tops 1½ cup fresh cube pineapple few snips fresh chives 1 clove chopped garlic
Table.Directions: Wisk: pour over salad – chill 1/3 cup enova oil 2 table white wine ½ clove chopped garlic 1 tea mustard juice of ½ lemon

Table.Title: Broccoli Casserole
Table.Ingredients: 1 box of Petridge Farms Stuffing 3 bags of chopped brocolli (cook and drain) ½ cup of butter 4 tablespoons flour 2 chicken bouillon 2 cups milk
Table.Directions:
Cook main ingredients over low heat.
topping: 2/3 cup of water 6 tablespoon butter 1 bread mix 2/3 cup of chopped pecans
place on top of casserole in a 3 qrt. Cass. Dish Bake 20 mins at 375 and cover.

Table.Title: Broccoli Rice Casserole
Table.Ingredients: 2 lbs. broccoli, diced 2 cups cooked rice 1 (8 oz) jar processed cheese spread ¼ cup butter or margarine 1 cup chopped onion 1 cup chopped celery 1 (10 ¾ oz) can cream of chicken soup ½ cup milk salt and pepper
Table.Directions: Parboil broccoli in ½ cup boiling salted water for 10 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain well. Place in 2-quart casserole. Stir in rice and half the cheese spread. Melt butter in skillet, add onion and celery and cook until tender but not to brown. Stir in soup and milk, and then season to taste with salt and pepper. Pour sauce over rice and broccoli mixture and mix well. Top casserole with remaining cheese and back at 350 degrees for 30 mins.

Table.Title: Green Beans with Toasted Pecans
Table.Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. butter melted 1 tsp. sugar ¼ tsp. Lawry's garlic powder with parsely pinch ground red pepper salt to taste 1/3 cup chopped pecans 1 lb. green beans
Table.Directions:
In a small bowl blend butter with sugar, garlic powder, pepper and salt. In 12 in nonstick skillet, heat 2 teaspoons garlic mixture over medium-high heat and cook pecans, stir frequently for 2 mins until pecans are golden brown. Remove from skillet.
In the same skillet, heat remaining garlic mixture and stir in green beans. Cook covered over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 6 mins or until green beans are tender. Stir in pecans.

Table.Title: EZ Vegetable Bake
Table.Ingredients: 1 bag California blend frozen vegetables 2 cups shredded reduce fat mild cheddar cheese 2 egg whites pepper to taste 1 can Healthy cream of mushroom soup 1 tablespoon of chopped onions ½ cup reduced calorie mayonnaise
Table.Directions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Cook frozen vegetables according to package directions. Let cool after cooking. In large bowl mix cheese, eggs whites, onions, mushroom soup, mayonnaise, and vegetables. Grease baking dish with Pam. Spread mixture into greased baking dish evenly. Bake at 350°F for 45 mins. Let cool for about 5 mins and serve.

Table.Title: Cheesy Broccoli & Potatoes
Table.Ingredients: 5 med. Potatoes, thinly sliced ½ cup water 2 cups frozen broccoli cuts 1 med. Onion, sliced ½ tsp. salt 1/8 tsp pepper 1 cup cubed American cheese 6 tablespoons butter
Table.Directions: Combine potatoes and water. Cover and microwave 13-15 mins. Drain. Layer potatoes, broccoli, onion, salt, pepper, & cheese in throw-a-way pan or casserole dish. Dot with margarine. Cover with foil Bake 20-30 mins on a grill or in an oven at 350°F.

Table.Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Table.Directions:
Chop mushrooms stems, sprinkle with garlic powder, salt, 2 tsp cheese. 1 tsp. bread crumbs, 1 tsp. parsley flakes.
Slice caps. Put a thin slice of butter on each cap.
Bake at 375 for 20 mins. Place under broiler for 3 mins (for 12).

Table.Title: Turkey Meatballs
Table.Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups seasoned bread crumbs 1 small onion 1 large egg 1/2 cup flat-leaf parsley chopped 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese Salt & Pepper 2 pounds of turkey 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil 2 cups chicken broth
Table.Directions:
Mix together: 1/2 cup of bread crumbs, onion, egg, parsley, parmesan & 1/2 teaspoon salt & pepper, and turkey. Roll into 1 1/2 inch balls (18 total)
Roll turkey ball in the rest of the bread crumbs to coat
In a non stick skillet-heat heat oil on medium - add meatballs and cook until brown about 8 minutes. Lower heat to med-low -add 1/2 cup chicken broth - cook until absorbed
Add remaining broth to pan in 1/4 cup ingredments until all the broth is absorbed, about 20 minutes

Table.Title: Asparagus Popover
Table.Ingredients: Preheat oven 425 Bake 20 mins 1 pound Asparagus 2 tablespoons butter 1/2 cup milk 3 large eggs (room temp) 1/2 cup flour 3 ounces of gruyere or swiss cheese (shredded about 1 cup) pinch sugar salt & pepper
Table.Directions:
Cook 1 pound of asparagus till crsip-tender (3minutes) drain rinse with cold water and pat dry
melt butter in oven - in a oven safe dish or pan
Medium bowl microwave milk for 30 sec. whisk in eggs, flour, salt, pepper & surgar
add asparagus to hot dish- pour batter on top - sprinkle with 1/2 the cheese
Bake until puffed and golden brown (18-20 mins) Top with remaining cheese and serve

Table.Title: Asparagus & Crab Salad
Table.Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds asparagus-quarter cross wise on a angle 8 ounces of cleaned crab meat 1 tablespoon of olive oil Salt & Pepper 2 tablespoons of finely chopped chives 2 tablespoons mayonnaise 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice + lemon wedges for serving 1 1/2 teaspoon ketchup
Table.Directions:
Cook aspargus in olive oil until crisp tender ( 3-4 minutes) season with salt & pepper
Medium bowl stir together chives, mayo, lemon juice, and ketchup- add crab and toss season with salt & pepper
Divide asparagus between 4 plates - mound with crab mixture serve with lemon wedges Hot sause can be added to mayo to add spice

Table.Title: Spinach Ricotta Pie
Table.Ingredients:
Pre heat oven 375
10 oz. frozen spinach, thawed- rung dry 15 oz. ricotta cheese 8 oz. garlic-herb spreadable cheese 4 large eggs -beaten 1 cup chopped marinated artichokes 1/2 teaspoon salt & 1/4 teaspoon pepper
Table.Directions:
Grease 9 inch pie plate with olive oil
Whisk together ricotta, garlic spread and eggs
Stir in spinach & artichokes add salt and pepper
Pour in prepared pan Bake 45 minutes- until golden

Table.Title: Hot Peach Salsa /c Steak Quesadillas
Table.Ingredients:
4 peaches -peeled and finelly chopped 1/2 cup funely chopped red onion 1 jalalpeno chile seeded and finely chopped 1/2 cup lime juice fresh (6 limes) 1/4 cup chopped cilantro 1/4 cup olive oil cover & refrigerate
8 flour tortillas 2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese Sour cream for serving
Table.Directions:
Large resealable plastic bag combine: 1/2 red (finely chopped) onion- 2 tablespoons each of lime juice and olive oil- 2 pound flank steak refrigerate 4 hours or over night
Pat steak dry, drizzle with oil and seaon with salt and pepper Grill, covered- on medium heat- 5 minutes for med-rare/ side let rest 10 minutes then slice
Pre heat pan with drizzled olive oil cover 1/2 half of tortilla with meat and 1/4 cup salsa & cheese fold place in pan and brown till golden (2minutes)

Table.Title: Chicken Cordon Blue Nuggets
Table.Ingredients: Cooking spray 2 large eggs - beaten /splash of water 1 cup breadcrumbs 1 teaspoon dried thyme 1/2 cup flour 6 deli ham slice (5ozs.) 6 deli swiss cheese cut lenghtwise into 4 strips 1 large chicken breast cut into 24 chunks
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 350 Spray baking sheet Plate-1 combine bread crums with thyme Plate-2 Combine flour with a pinch of salt & pepper
Lay ham strip on surface- layer with cheese- top one end with chicken- roll Lightly coat with flour- egg- breadcrumbs Place seam side down on baking sheet When done all 20: lightly spray with cooking spray- then bake about 20 minutes

Table.Title: 3 Cheese Spinach Orzo Bake
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 - 1 cup cooked orzo al a dente 1 cup prepared tomato-based pasta sauce 1/2 c parmesan cheese 10 oz. frozen chopped spinach - thawed - drain squeezed dry 2 large eggs - lightly beaten 1/2 c (low fat) ricotta cheese 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 1/2 - 1 c mozzrella (lowfat) cheese for topping
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 375 Cook 30 minutes Spray 9 inch pie plate /c cooking spray
Spread - 1/2c sauce & parmesan cheese in bottom of pan
Add cook pasta to top of sauce mixture
Medium bowl- mix - spinach, eggs, ricotta, nutmeg -season with salt & pepper spoon on top of pasta Top with remaining sauce & sprinkle with mozzarella cheese
Cook until cheese melts Serve with fresh fruit for dessert

Table.Title: Shrimp,Bean &Pasta Salad
Table.Ingredients: 4 oz. green beans cooked till bright green 8 oz. rotini a la dente 1 lb. med (cook & clean) shrimp 2-4 tablespoons fresh chopped dill 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar 1 tablespoon lemon juice 2 tablespoons olive oil 4 oz. crumble feta cheese
Table.Directions:
Cool 1 inch beans in ice water to stop cooking - drain well - pat dry
Cool pasta in ice water - drain well
Large bowl combine: vinegar,dill,lemon juice, & oil add beans; shrimp; pasta; & cheese
Can be refrigerated up till 2 days

Table.Title: Crispy Ranch Chicken
Table.Ingredients: 2 cups rice ceral 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese 1 envelope (1oz.) Ranch dressing 2 egg whites-beaten 8 skinless breast/thighs (5oz. each)
Table.Directions:
Pre heat Oven 350 Spray baking sheet
Large bowl combine: rice; cheese; dressing
Medium bowl beat egg whites
Dip chicken in eggs then rice combo- place on baking sheet
Bake 20-25 minutes until juice runs clear serve hot

Table.Title: Blueberry Muffins
Table.Ingredients:
Preheat Oven 400 Line or spray muffin tin
1 1/2 c flour 1 tablespoon baking powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 sugar 4 tablespoons melted butter 1 large egg - beaten 3/4 c milk + 2 tablespoons 1 cup blueberries (chopped apricots;cranberries)
Table.Directions:
Large bowl: Sift: flour; baking powder Stir in sugar Small bowl Whisk: milk; egg; butter Whisk: wet ingredients into dry - maybe lumpy
Fold in berries
Bake 18-24 minutes until golden brown Cool on wire rack serve warm

Table.Title: Peach Crisp
Table.Ingredients: 2 cans 15oz. sliced peaches(Harvest Spice) 1/2 cup flour 1/3 cup brown sugar 1/3 cup old fashion oats 1/3 cup chopped walnuts 1/3 cup soften butter
Table.Directions:
Prehat Oven 425
Place fruit in 8 x 8 baking dish
Combine: flour; sugar; oats; nuts
Mix: buter until crumbly top on fruit
Bake 15-20 minutes cool 20 minutes serve with ice cream

Table.Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Table.Ingredients: 1 lb. chicken breast cut into 1/2 inch pieces 1 pkg. (1.25oz) taco seasoning 1 jar chunky stlye salsa 1 can black beans rinsed & drained 8 oz. can corn (cook frozen corn) 8 oz. Mexican cheese divided 1 can Enchilada sauce 8 - 6 inch flour tortillas 2 tablespoons sliced black olives 2 tablespoons sliced green onions
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 375 Spread 1/4 cup sauce into bottom of 13 x9 baking pan
Prepare chicken according to taco package directions Cool 10 minutes Add: beans; corn; 1 cup cheese & salsa
Soften tortillas according to package directions
Place 2/3 cup of chicken mixture into each tortilla - roll - place seam side down in pan
Pour remaing sauce over tortillas - top with cheese; olives & onion
Bake 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and filling hot

Table.Title: Homestyle Macroni & Cheese
Table.Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups hot water 1 pkg. deluxe Mac & Cheese 1/4 teaspoon fresh pepper (red or black) 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar Cheese 1 cup fat free cream cheese 1/4 cup crushed crackers 1 tablespoon melted butter
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 375 Spray 1 1/2 qrt. casserol dish
Whisk:in dish - cheese sauce pouch; water; pepper Stir in dry macroni - 1 cup cheese
Bake Covered 30 minutes
ADD: stir in sourcream
MIX: crackers and melted butter +1/2cup cheese Sprinkle on Top:
Bake uncovered 10 minutes
Cool 5 minutes then serve

Table.Title: Maryland Fried Chicken Gravy
Table.Ingredients: 4 pounds (bone in) chicken 1 tablespoon dry mustard 1 tablespoon garlic powder 1 teaspoon salt 1 - 2 cups flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 3 cups oil Old Bay to taste GRAVY: 1/4 cup flour 2 cups chicken broth 1 cup heavy cream 1 teaspoon pepper - salt to taste
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350 Pat Chicken Dry
Combine in bag: mustard; garlic & salt coat chicken
Refrigerate 30 minutes
Combine flour & baking powder in plate - dredge chicken to coat
Place chicken in hot oil - cook until brown - about 5 minutes
Sprinkle with Old Bay - Place in oven Cook until done 15-20 minutes (?)
GRAVY: Pour all but 1/4 cup fat away Stir in flour - cook until golden (2minutes) Whisk in broth; cream; & pepper Simmer until thicken (5minutes)

Table.Title: Orange Glazed Pork Tenderloin
Table.Ingredients: 2 tablespoons sesame oil 1 1/4 lb. tenderloin (trimed of silverskin) - cut into 1/2 inch rounds 1 1/4 cup orange marmalade/ apricot preserves 1/4 cup soy sauce 1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced
Table.Directions:
Season both sides of pork with salt & pepper
Brown in oil over high heat 2 minutes/side
ADD: marmalade; soy sauce and ginger Simmer until pork is cook through (slightly pink in center) about 5 minutes
Serve over rice

Table.Title: Ham & Egg Brunch Casserole Breakfast
Table.Ingredients: 8-10 slices bread - crust trimmed- cubed 1 lb. cooked ham - cubed 3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese 3/4 c. shredded Swiss cheese 7 - 8 beaten eggs 2-3/4 c. milk 1 tea. mustard (dry) 1-1/4 teaspoon salt 4 Table. butter melted
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 325
Place cubed bread & ham in buttered 9x13 baking dish
Sprinkle cheese on top
Combine: eggs,milk, mustard, salt & pepper Pour over cheese Pour melted butter on top Cover and refrigerate overnight/ Bake uncoverered for 1 hour or until center test done

Table.Title: Crumb Coffee Cake
Table.Ingredients: 4 eggs Duncan Hines vanilla cake mix 1 pkg dream whip 1 c. water 1-1/2 teaspoons vanilla 1-1/2 pounds butter (6 sticks) 6 c. flour 1-3/4 c. sugar 3 teaspoons cinnamon 4-1/2 teaspoons vanilla (1 tablespoon + 1-1/2 tea.)
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350 Grease & Flour large pan (17 x 11 x3) Soften sticks of butter - must be plyable- (room temp for 1 hour or microwave for 60 secs)
Cake: Beat eggs six minutes Add cake mix, dream whip, water & vanilla - Mix well- Pour into greased pan Bake 20 minutes - until golden brown- Remove from oven
Topping: Mix flour, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon & soften butter by hand till well mixed.
If butter is very soft it will form a wet mass, if butter is a little harder it will be more crumbly. Drop by pieces on top of hot cake. I literally just rub it between my hands and let it fall making sure all the surface of the cake is covered.
Bake an additional 20 minutes - turn oven off Let cake rest in oven till your ready to serve. I've been known to go to bed and cut it in the morning. (I do check to make sure the topping is not to brown. It will appear a white-ish brown in center and darker as you get to the edges. You really can not mess this cake up. I have tried using 1/2 brown sugar & white sugar and I could not detect a difference in taste. Have Fun

Table.Title: Spinach Salad
Table.Ingredients: 1/4 cup warm maple syrup 1 1/2 tablespoon cidar vinegar 1/4 cup olive oil 1/4 cup Feta cheese 1 bag spinach 1/2 cup walnut pieces cranberries
Table.Directions:
Whisk: warm maple syrup, cidar vinegar, olive oil
Combine: spinach, walnut pieces, and canberries
Pour over salad just before serving : Gently toss

Table.Title: 1 2 3 4 CAKE
Table.Ingredients: Regular cake Pound cake 1 cup butter 1 1/2 cup butter 2 cups sugar 2 cups sugar 3 cups flour 3 cups flour 4 eggs beaten 5 beaten eggs 1 cup luke warm milk 1 cup warm milk 3 teasp. vanilla 1 teasp. lemon 3 teasp. baking powder 2 teasp. baking powder
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 350 grease pan
Cream: butter,eggs, sugar
Add: flour, milk, vanilla and baking powder

Table.Title: Splenda Hot Cocoa
Table.Ingredients:
8 packets splenda
3 tablespoons cocoa
2 cups 2% milk

Table.Title: Splenda Chocolate Chips
Table.Ingredients:
Pre heat oven 350 Cook 10-12 minutes
2/3 cup butter softened 2/3 cup brown sugar firmly packed 2/3 cup splenda granulated sweetner 2 teaspoons vanilla 2 eggs 1 1/2 cups all purpose flour 1 teaspoon baking soda 1/4 teasp. salt 1 cup chocolate chips
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350
Cream in a med bowl: butter, brown sugar, splenda, and vanilla
Add: eggs one at a time mix well
Add: flour, baking soda, salt
bake until golden brown cool on wire rack

Table.Title: Roasted Potatoe Medley
Table.Ingredients: 2 sweet potatoes 8 new potatoes 4 yukon gold potatoes 1/4 cup olive oil + 2 table 1 teaspoon dried tarragon/ thyme/rosemary 1/8 teaspoon pepper and salt
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven
Peel and cube: yukon gold and sweet potatoes scrub new potatoes and cube Boil in salted water for 3 minutes Drain thoroughly
Spread potatoes in a single layer on a non stick baking sheet
Drizzle potatoes with olive oil and sprinkle with choice of spice, salt and pepper
Roast potatoes until brown and crisp about 25 minutes

Table.Title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 cup soy sauce 2 tablespoon lemon 1 tablespoon corn starch 1 tablespoon brown sugar 1 clove minced garlic 1 teaspoon black pepper 2 tablespoons veg. oil 2 pounds top sirloin cut in 1/4 inch thick strips 2 medim heads of broccoli (4 cups florets) 2 teaspoons fresh ginger root 1 medium onion thin sliced
Table.Directions:
Small bowl Combine: soy sauce, lemonjuice, cornstarch, brownsugar, garlic and pepper
Heat 1 talblespoon oil in pan or`wok over med-high heat
Add beef cook 2 minutes transfer to plate keep warm
Heat remaing oil add onion stir fry 5 minutes Add broccoli and 1/2 cup water bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 3 minutes
Return beef to skillet with soy sauce mixture Add ginger bring to a boil stirring constantly until thickens about 2 minutes

Table.Title: Asparagus & Rice
Table.Ingredients: 1 cup rice 1 cup chicken stock 1 cup water 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 clove garlic 3/4 pound asparagus cleaned and cut 1/2 inch pieces 1/2 teaspoon orange zest
Table.Directions:
Large pans : bring broth, garlic, salt to a boil
Add rice Cover simmer on low 18-20 miutes until broth is absorbed
Remove from heat immediatly add: asparagus and orange zest
Cover let aspargus steam as rice cools

Table.Title: Crustless Quiche Breakfast
Table.Ingredients:
Preheat Oven 350
6 eggs slightly beaten 1 1/2 cups of heavy cream (can use 1/2 & 1/2) 2 cups vegetables (cup up) can saute 1 cup swiss cheese 3 tablespoons butter Salt Pepper Nutmeg Garlic powder Basil
Table.Directions:
Butter pie pan
layer vegetables & cheese
Add: seasoning to slightly beaten eggs
Pour over pie.
Bake for 30 minutes Take out of oven sprinkle top with parmesean cheese Bake 15 minutes longer

Table.Title: French Toast /c Strawberries
Table.Ingredients: 8 oz ricotta cheese 3 tablespoon powdered sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla 16 slices texas toast/ french bread 2 eggs 1 cup milk
Table.Directions:
Small bowl: Combine: ricotta,sugar, & vanilla Spread 2 teaspoon of mix on 8 slices of bread/ top with remaining bread
Small bowl: Beat: eggs & milk Soak sandwiches for 1-2 minutes on each side
Cook on hot greased griddle for 3 - 5 minutes
Garnish with powder and strawberries

Table.Title: Blueberry Breakfast Cake
Table.Ingredients: 2 cups blueberries 1 1/2 cups flour 2 tablesoons flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup butter 1 cup sugar 2 eggs 1/3cup milk 1 teaspoon vanilla
Table.Directions:
Pre heat 350 Grease 8 x 8
Toss blueberries in 2 T. flour set aside Sift: flour, baking powder, salt
Cream: butter & sugar till fluffy add eggs one at time
Alternate: milk and flour to cream mixture
Stir in vanilla and blueberries
Bake in well greased 8 x 8 baking dish sprinkle with sugar
35-40 minutes

Table.Title: Hashbrown Breakfast Bake
Table.Ingredients: 2 pound package frozen shredded hasbrowns Salt & pepper to taste 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 cup sour cream 10 3/4 oz. cream of chicken soup 3 cups cheddar cheese 1/2 cup butter
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 350 Grease 9 x 13 pan
Place hashbrown in pan and season with salt & pepper
Combine: onion, sour cream, soup POUR over potatoes
Sprinkle cheese Dot with butter
Bake 1 hour until top is golden

Table.Title: Heavenly Potatoes Breakfast
Table.Ingredients: 6 cook & grated peeled potatoes 2 pints whipping cream onion salt & pepper to taste
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350 Grease 9 x 13 glass baking dish
Layer 1/2 the potatoes in dish Pour 1 pint cream over top
Sprinkle with onion salt & pepper
Repeat Layers Cover refrigerate overnight
Cook 1 hour

Table.Title: Morning Pecan Breakfast Surprise
Table.Ingredients: 8 oz sausage patties 16 oz. cubed raisin-cinnamon bread 6 eggs 1 1/2 cup milk 1 1/2 cup 1/2 & 1/2 1 teaspoon vanilla 1/4 teas nutmeg 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon 1 cup brown sugar 1 cup chopped pecans 1/2 cup soft butter 2 tablespoons maple syrup
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 350 35-40 minutes Spray 9 x 13 pan
Place cubed bread in pan Brown and cut up paddies in cubes place on top of bread
Large Bowl: Beat - eggs, milk, half and half, vanilla, nutmeg and cinnamon Pour over bread pressing bread and sausage into egg mixture Cover refridgerate - 8 hours or overnight
Before Baking Add
TOPPING (for morning) Med bowl: Combine: butter, brown sugar, pecans & syrup Drop by spoonful over top of casserole Bake until center test done

Table.Title: Ham & Cheddar Breakfast Eggs
Table.Ingredients: 6 slices bread 2 c. cooked ham 2 c. shredded cheddar cheese 4 1/2 oz. can chopped geen chilies 1 tea. dry mustrad 3 c. milk 8 beaten eggs 1 tea. salt
Table.Directions:
Pre heat Oven 350 Spray 9 x 13 pan
Line bottom of pan with bread slices
Layer: ham, cheese, chilies
Sprinkle mustard on top
Combine: beaten eggs, salt & milk Pour on top
Cover & refrigerate overnight
Bake uncovered 1 hour - until center test done
Can be garnished with sour cream and salsa

Table.Title: Make Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Table.Ingredients: 12 beaten eggs 1/2 c. milk 1/2 tea. salt 1/4 tea. pepper 1 table. butter 1 c. sour cream 12 slices crisp bacon- crumbled 1 c. shredded sharp cheddar cheese
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 350 Butter 2 quart baking dish
Stir together: eggs,milk,salt, pepper
Melt butter in pan - cook eggs until set, but moist: remove from heat and cool
Stir in sour cream Spread egg mixture in buttered pan
Top: bacon & cheese
Cover - refrigerate over night
Bake uncovered 15-20 minutes

Table.Title: N. Carolina Barbecue
Table.Ingredients: 4 - 5 pound pork roast 1 onion, chopped 1 c. vinegar 1/2 c. catsup 1/2 c. worcestershire sauce 3 table brown sugar 2 table dry mustard 1 tea. salt 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes 1/4 teaspoon pepper
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 325
Mix: all ingredients
Pour over roast
Bake 5 -6 hours
Remove meat from bone & shred Refrigerate sauce remove fat
reheat meat with sauce bake 15 minutes until through

Table.Title: Spinach & Bacon Quiche Breakfast
Table.Ingredients: 9 inch pie shell 3 beaten eggs 1 c. 1/2 & 1/2 1 tablespoon flour 10 oz. pkg frozen chopped spinach thawed & drained 8 slices crisp bacon 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1 c. shredded sharp cheddard cheese 1 c. shredded mozzarella cheese
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 400
Fit pie crust to pie plate
Whisk: eggs,1/2 & 1/2, flour, salt
Stir in: spinach, onions, bacon & cheeses
Pour into crust
Bake @ 400 for 15 minutes
Reduce heat to 325 bake additional 30 minutes
Cool 5 minutes before serving

Table.Title: PEACH / APPLE COFFEE CAKE
Table.Ingredients:
TOPPING 6 large apples/peaches cinnanmon 1/2 c. sugar
BATTER 1/4 c. oil 1 c. sugar 2 extra large eggs 2 c. flour 3 teaspoon baking powder 1 teaspoon vanilla 2/3 c. milk shake of salt 2 teaspoons/tablespoons butter
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 350 Grease & flour 9 x 13
Large Bowel: Peel and slice fruit - toss apples with cinnamon & sugar toss peaches with sugar
Med.Bowel - Beat: eggs, oil, sugar
Mix: batter with flour, milk, vanilla, baking powder, salt
POUR INTO PAN
TOP: Arrange apples/peaches on top of dough in rows dot with butter
Bake: 30 minutes until done in center

Table.Title: Crunchy Onion Chicken /Pork/Fish
Table.Ingredients: 2 c. (4 oz.) French's fried onions 2 tablespon flour 4 (5oz.) boneless chicken beast 1 beaten egg Subsitute for egg: 1/4 c. any flavor musard
Table.Directions:

Dip chicken in egg
Coat in onions
Bake 20 minutes till done

Table.Title: Montreal Pepper Steak Marinade

Mix: all ingredients in large bag

Cook/ grill

Med. bowl Whisk together: lemon juice/vinegar mustard cumin, salt, pepper

Table.Title: Caramel Pecan Rolls/ Garlic Bread

1 large can grands original biscuits (cut into 1/4 with serrated knife) 1 stick butter
A. PECAN ROLLS: 1/2 jar carmel topping cinnamon & sugar 1 c. pecans (chopped)

Remove from oven Place large plate on top Invert Serve

Table.Title: Greek Salsa/ Salad
Table.Ingredients: Athenos Feta Cheese 3.5 ozs. 1/2 c. halved kalamata olives 1/2 c. chopped red onions 1/2 c. chopped cucumbers 1/2 c. chopped roasted red peppers 1/2 c. Good Seasoning Lite greek vinaigrette with oregano 1/2 c. Athenos fat reduced dressing SALAD 1 bag 10 oz. mixed greens 4 0z. feta cheese 3/4 c pitted olives 3 plum tomatoes 1/2 c. thinly slices re onion 1/2 med. cuke 1/2 c. Good Seasoning Lite greek vinaigrette Dressing
Table.Directions:
Mix all ingredients
Serve with pita chips

Bake

Table.Title: Tri Color Macaroni Salad
Table.Ingredients: 12 0z. Tri color rotini 2 c. broccoli florets 1/4 c. balsamic vinegar 3/4 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon black pepper 1/8 teaspoon red pepper 3/4 c. olive oil 1 c. shredded carrots 3/4 c. fresh chopped basil - divided 3/4 c. red/or yellow/or green bell pepper finely chopped - divided 1 c. kalamata olives 3/4 c. fresh grated paresan cheese 1/2 c. green onions - sliced

Table.Title: Lemon Chicken Crock Pot
Table.Ingredients: 1 lemon pierced with fork 1 whole roasting chicken fits in pot {about 6 pounds} 1/2 cup honey 1/2 cup fresh orange juice or lemon juice
Table.Directions:
Place whole lemon in washed chicken Pace in crock pot
Combine: honey & oj
Pour over chicken
Cook on low 8 hours

Table.Title: Homestyle Macaroni & Cheese
Table.Ingredients: 2 1/4 c. hot water 1 pkg. kraft delux mac & cheese 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 1/2 cups shredded cheddar cheese 1 c. fat free sour cream 1/4 c. crushed crackers 1 tablespoon butter
Table.Directions:
Pre Heat Oven 375 Whisk in cheese pouch & water in 1 1/2 quart casserole stir in dry pasta & 1 c. shredded cheese
Cover with lid Bake 30 minutes
Remove from oven
Stir in sour cream
Mix remaning cheese ,crackers and butter. Sprinkle on top
Bake uncovered 10 minutes Let stand 5 miutes before serving

Table.Title: Sweet Potatoes/Judi
Table.Ingredients: 3 lbs. sweet potatoes 5 lbs. sweet potatoes cooked, skined,cubed skined,cubed, cooked 2 eggs 3 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 c. sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 1/2 tea. vanilla 1/3 c. milk 1/2 c. milk TOPPING TOPPING 1 c. brown sugar 1 2/3 c. brown sugar 1/3 c. flour 3/4 c. flour ? 1/3 c. butter 1 stick butter 1 c. pecans - chopped 2 c. pecans cinnamon to taste 2 teaspoons
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 350 Spray 9 x 13 baking dish
Large Bowl: mash/beat cooked sweet potatoes
Add: eggs, sugar, vanilla & milk
Beat till blended
Pour into baking dish
Topping:
Mix all ingredients spread on top of potatoes
Bake uncovered 30 minutes 5 lbs. sweet potatoes cooked, skined,cubed 3 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 1/2 tea. vanila 1/2 c. milk TOPPING 1 2/3 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. flour ? 1 stick butter 2 c. pecans cinnamon to taste 2 teaspoons

Table.Title: Pinapple Stuffing
Table.Ingredients: 5-6 slices bread slices - cubed 20 0z. pinapple tidbits 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 4 eggs
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 375 Grease 1 1/2 qrt casserole
Cream: sugar, butter
Add: eggs one at a time beat well
Stir in pinapple and bread cubes
Bake 50-60 minutes

Table.Title: Raisin Sauce
Table.Ingredients: 10 oz red current jelly 1/2 c. golden raisin 1/4 c. butter 2 teaspoons lemon juice 1/4 teaspoon all spice
Table.Directions:
Sauce pan
Melt butter and jelly
Add juice and spice, raisin

Table.Title: Cream of Crab Soup
Table.Ingredients: 1 pound crab meat cleaned 7 bouillon cubes chicken 3/4 c. flour 2 sticks butter 1 gal milk Old Bay salt & pepper Thyme to taste
Table.Directions:
Med Sauce pan
Melt butter Add Flour brown slightly
Gradually add milk stirring constantly till desired thickness
Add spices and crab meat season to taste

Table.Title: Cheese Danish Breakfast
Table.Ingredients: 2 8oz. packages of cream cheese 2/3 c. sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 egg separated 2 cans cresant rolls
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 350 Grease 9 x 13
Beat: cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, egg yolk
Lay 1 can of rolls on bottom of pan
Spread cheese mixture on top
Lay 2 can of rolls on top of cream cheese
Glaze with egg white and sprinkle with additional sugar
Bake 30 -40 minutes ( 35 works well)

Table.Title: Biscotta COOKIES
Table.Ingredients: 1 Stick of margarine or butter 8 tablespoons of crisco (unflavored) 1 1/2 cups 10x sugar 3 eggs 3 teaspoons of vanilla 3 teaspoons of baking powder 3 cups flour ICING 2 teaspoons lemon juice 1 tablespoon melted butter (10-15 sec. in microwave) 1 cup of 10x sugar (1/4 cup at a time) 1 teaspoon of water for each 1/4 cup (3 teaspoons = 1 table spoon) Sprinkles any kind will do
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350
Cream: margarine/butter and crisco
Add: 10x sugar & eggs (1 at a time), vanilla Mix: flour with baking powder Add: gradually to mix - till the dough does not stick to your hands (you will need to roll it, you may need to use up to 5cups of flour) I usually add a 1/2 cup at at time, one of these batches had 3 1/2 cups and one 4 1/4 cups
Bake on ungreased cookie sheet till golden on bottom. 10-12 minutes The top may or may not get brown. We used to put them under the broiled for a few seconds when I was little, that was when the broiler was located at the bottom of the oven in a separate area.
Cool on rack I have icined them the next day or hours later. I will store them for several days in an air tight container and then icing.
Icing I mix the juice and butter by hand till well blended then add sugar a little bit at a time so it is easer to mix. The icing will be a liquid - not to thin
Brush, spoon, dip any way you want to get the icing on the cookie I have tried it several ways and it is still messy I usually put them back on the cookie sheet(on a rack) to dry and sprinkle them with colored sugars or multi colored beads, all of it works.
Store in a air tight container. They seem to freeze well.

Table.Title: Breakfast Scramble Eggs
Table.Ingredients: 2 cups butter (divided) 2 tablespoons flour 2 teaspoons salt 1/8 teaspoon pepper 2 cups milk 1 cup (4 oz) shredded cheese 1/4 cup sliced green onion 12 beaten eggs 4 oz mushrooms - drained 1 1/2 cups soft bread cubes
Table.Directions:
Greased 11 x 7 (2inches high) Preheat oven 350
Melt 2 teaspoons of butter
Add: flour, salt, pepper cook till browned Add: milk gradually till thicken - remove from heat Add: cheese - set aside
Large skillet melt 3 tables butter - add onions cook till tender - eggs Cook until eggs begin to set Add mushrooms and cheese sauce - mix well
Pour into pan Refrigerate 2-3 hours or overnight
Topping melt butter and bread crumbs - brown - sprainkle over top of eggs - add a few onions for garnish
Bake for 25 - 30 minutes until top is golden brown

Table.Title: Gallet Cookies 1/2 Batch
Table.Ingredients: 1 cup butter 2 1/2 cups white sugar 1/2 cup brown sugar 6 large eggs 7 - 10 cups flour 1 tablespoon butter nut vanilla
Table.Directions:
warm iron on stove -till hot-water will sizzle- #7.5 mom's stove
Cream: butter & sugars
Add: eggs -1 at a time - beat well, butternut vanilla Gradually add the flour you may need all ten cups- go by feel- they may be a little sticky (I have used as many as 9 and as little as 7 - 8 works well) Refrigerate 1 hour
Roll dough into 1 inch deep x 3/4 inch-1 inch long log
Cook 20 secs Flip Cook 30 secs Remove cookie to to cooling rack

Table.Title: Gallett Cookies Memere Original Recipe
Table.Ingredients: 5 pounds flour 3 pounds sugar - 1/2 white & 1/2 brown ok 1 pound butter 1 dozen eggs 2 tablespoons butter nut vanilla
Table.Directions:
cream: 4 sticks butter, sugar
Beat: eggs
Add: 20 cups flour & vanilla
refrig 1 hour roll cook

Table.Title: CHOCOLATE RUM BALL COOKIE
Table.Ingredients: 3/4 cup crisco 1 1/4 cup sugar 3 eggs 1/4 cup rum 1/8 cup OJ 1 tablespoon vanilla 4 cups flour 2 teaspoons powder cloves 5 teaspoons coco 1 teaspoon baking powder 1/2 cup chopped walnuts grated rine 1 orange
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 325 13-14 minutes
Cream: crisco & sugar Add: eggs beat well Add: rum, oj, vanilla, cloves, flour Add: rind & nuts
roll about 1 inch balls

Table.Title: Reuben Casserole
Table.Ingredients: 1 loaf rye bread (cut into cubes) 1 (16 ounce) can sauerkraut 1 1/2 cups swiss cheese, shredded (sliced ok) 1 cup sour cream (1/2 c sour cream) 1/2 cup thousand island dressing (1 cup thousand island) 2 cups corned beef, cut into small pieces (deli cut med.) 1/2 cup butter or margarine, melted
Table.Directions:
Preheat Oven 350
1. Put half of the rye bread cubes into a greased sheet cake pan. 2. Top with the sauerkraut. 3. Mix the sour cream and thousand island dressing together and spoon half on top the sauerkraut. 4. Top with 1 cup of the swiss cheese. 5. Top with the corned beef. 6. Top with the rest of the sour cream/dressing mix. 7. Lastly, top with the remainder of the bread cubes and the remainder of the swiss cheese. 8. Drizzle the melted butter over all. 9. Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. 10. Uncover and bake an additional 10 minutes. 11. Serve hot.

Table.Title: Apricot Fold ups Cookie
Table.Ingredients:
12 - 16 ozs. dried apricots 2 cups water 1 1/2 cups grandulated sugar
2 cups flour 1 teaspoon salt 8 oz. soften cream cheese 1 cup (room temp.) butter 1 tablespoon milk 1 tablespoon white vingar
Glaze: 3/4 cup 10x sugar 1 tablespoon water
Table.Directions:
Apricots: I. Put 1st three ingredents into a sauce pan and bring to a boil. Romove from heat. Let apricots cool in water. Drain when cooled.
II. Pastry: Using a pastry blender, cut butter and cheese into flour & salt Add: milk & vinegar Work dough with hands until it holds together Divide dough into 4 balls - wrap with wax paper- refrigerate at least 2 hours Using a lightly floured board - roll dough to 1/8" thickness - cut into 2 1/2" squares Place an apricot in center of square - fold up coners- pinch to hold
Bake on a ungreased cookie sheet for 15 minutes at 400 degrees
III. When cool drizzle with glaze
Store in an air tight container

Table.Title: Zucchini Bread
Table.Ingredients: 3 eggs 2 cups sugar 1 cup oil 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1 teaspoon baking soda 1/4 teaspoon baking powder 2 cups grated zucchini 3 cups flour Optional: 1 cup walnuts 2 cups chcocolate chips 1 teaspoon salt
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350 Grease & flour 2 loaf pans
Beat: eggs, sugar, oil till creamy cinnamon, salt, baking soda & powder
ADD: flour and zucchini (alternating between the two)
BAKE: 1 hour or until golden brown and toothpick comes out clean Glass pans bake faster, metal may take 10 minutes longer

Table.Title: Chocolate Pretzel Rods
Table.Ingredients:
1 package of pretzel rods 2 12oz. semi-sweet chocolate/white chips
Toppings: sprinkles - colored sugars crushed Oreos mini M & M's candy canes toasted shredded coconut chopped nuts
Table.Directions:
Line baking sheet with wax paper
Melt: Chocolate in double boiler or microwave for 30 secs-stirring between heatings-until totally melted.
Immeditately dip rods in chocolate - shake off excess - lay on wax paper
Kids can scatter toppings on wet chocolate
Chill or Freeze till set
Store loosely covered in a cool dry place

Table.Title: Spiced Pecan Nuts
Table.Ingredients: 1 egg white 2 tablespoons water 1 pound pecans 3/4 cup sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon cinnamon
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 250
Beat: egg white - water till froththy
Add: sugar, salt, cinnamon - stir till moistened
Add: pecans - stir till coated
Bake: 1 hour - stirring every 15 minutes

Table.Title: Zucchini Quiche
Table.Ingredients: 4 beaten eggs 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella 1/2 cup oil 3 cups thinly sliced zucchin 1/2 onion thinly sliced 1 teaspoon fresh parsley minced 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1 cup biscuit baking mix
Table.Directions:

Combine: biscuit,eggs,cheese & oil - blend till smooth

Bake 30 minutes

Table.Title: MORNAY SAUCE FOR CORDON BLEU
Table.Ingredients: 1 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. flour 1 c. milk 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese 1/2 - 1 tsp. garlic powder Salt and pepper
Table.Directions: In small saucepan, melt butter. With a whisk, beat in flour. When mixture bubbles, add milk all at once, stirring with a whisk to avoid lumps. Stir in cheese, garlic powder and salt and pepper to taste. Cook, stirring constantly until it's thick. Pour over baked Chicken Cordon Bleu just before serving.

Table.Title: Poor Mans Crab Cakes
Table.Ingredients: 2 Cups zucchini 2 eggs 1 Tbs mayo 2 Cups panko bread crumbs 1 Tbs old Bay (or to taste) 1 tsp mustard 1 Tbs worchester sause.
Table.Directions:
Shred a zucchini by hand or in a processor, squeeze out as much liquid as you can.
Mix together, make into cakes.
Fry in oil as you would a crab cake, about 5 mins per side

Table.Title: Cucumber Dressing

Table.Directions: Slice 4 cucumbers Mix:

Table.Title: Italian Chicken Tenders
Table.Ingredients: 1 lb.chicken tenders (cut in 1/2 & dried) 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 2 teaspoons oil 2 cups chopped onion 2/3 cup chicken broth 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1 teaspoon oregano 15 oz. cannellini beans 7 oz. jar roasted peppers (drained & chopped) 1/4 cup shredded parmesan
Table.Directions:
Heat: Heavy non-stick skillet with oil, Lightly brown chicken & black pepper Remove: chicken to bowl
ADD to skillet: onions till soft; minced garlic for 30 secs.
STIR: in chicken broth, pepper flakes oregano, beans & red peppers
RETURN: chicken to skillet, cover cook (165F)
SERVE: with cheese

Table.Title: Irish Potato Soup
Table.Ingredients: 3 medium potatoes, sliced 1/4 " thick (3 cups) 2 tablespoons butter 4 med. green onions (1/2 cup) 1 stalk celery (1/2 cup) 1 3/4 cup chicken broth dash black pepper 1 1/2 cup milk
Table.Directions:
3 Quart sauce pan
Melt: butter
ADD: onions & celery till tender
STIR: broth, pepper,potatoes
COVER: & cook 15 minutes until potatoes are done
Hand held blender: blend till smooth

Table.Title: Oven Baked Chicken
Table.Ingredients: 1/2 c dry breadcrumbs 1/4 c grated Parmesan Cheese 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley 1/2 tea. pepper 1/4 tea. salt 1/2 cup melted butter 2 tea. fresh finely chopped garlic 6 boneless chicken breast
Table.Directions:
Heat oven 375 ungreased 13 x 9 baking pan
Combine: in a shallow bowl - breadcrumbs, cheese, parsley, salt & pepper
in a 9" pie pan - butter & garlic
Dip breast in butter - then breadcrumb mixture to coat - place in pan
Cook 25 to 35 minutes until juice runs clear
You can add 1/2 tea. dry herbs (rosemary/sage) to butter for a change of flavor

Table.Title: Pasta Fagioli
Table.Ingredients: 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil 1 Tablespoon Mrs. Dash Garlic & Herb 1 Tablespoon Mrs. Dash Tomato Basil Garlic 2 Tablespoons tomato paste 15 oz Tomatoes 64 Oz Chicken Broth 28 oz. Cannelloni Beans 1 cup small elbow pasta 1/4 c grated Parmesan cheese
Table.Directions:
In a heavy sauce pan:
Heat oil: med. heat
Add: blends, paste, tomatoes, broth & beans
Bring to a boil - reduce heat - cook 10 mintues
Add: pasta - cook another 10-15 minutes
Garnish with cheese
10gm proteins 160 calories 25 gm carbohydrates

Table.Title: Pulled Pork/Chicken Slow Cook
Table.Ingredients: 2/3 cup Lea & Perkins Worcestershire sauce 1/2 cup Ketchup 1/4 cup brown sugar 1/4 cup tomato paste 1 medium onion chopped 2 Table. yellow mustard 2 Table. white vinegar 3 1/2 lb. boneless pork shoulder/ 6 boneless chicken breast
Table.Directions:
In a 6 quart crock post add all ingredients
Add pork/chicken turn to coat
Cook on low 8 -10 hours
Remove meat - shred with 2 forks Return to crock pot Serve 1/2 cup on bun

Table.Title: Roasted Red Potatoes Veggie
Table.Ingredients: 12 Small Red Potatoes 1 Tablespoon Olive oil 1 1/2 Tablespoons Mrs. Dash Seasoning original divided
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 400F
Cut potatoes in to wedges
Bowl: toss with oil and 1 tablespoon seasonings
Roast in 400 degree oven for 30 minutes
Increase temp. to 450F
Sprinkle remaining seasonings and contin;ue to roast for 5-10 minutes till tender and brown

Table.Title: Apricot/Peach Fold Ups Cookie
Table.Ingredients:
12 oz. Dried Apricots/Peach (cut in half) 2 cups water 1 1/2 cup sugar
2 cups flour 1 teaspoon salt 8 oz. cream cheese soften 1 cup butter soften 1 tablespoon milk 1 tablespoon white vinegar Glaze: 3/4 10x sugar 1 Tablespoon water
Table.Directions:
Mix in a sauce pan till it boils: water,sugar & apricots - remove from heat - let cool in liquid - then drain
With Pastry blender - cut butter and cheese into flour and salt
Add: milk, vinegar
Work dough with hands till it holds together. Divide into 4 balls. Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate at least 2 hours
Preheat oven 400F
Roll dough ball on a lightly floured board (1/8" thick)
Cut 2 1/2" squares Place apricot/1/2 peach in center - Pinch corners together
Place each cookie on ungreased cookie sheet
Bake for 15 minutes
Glaze Drizzle: 3/4 cup 10x sugar & 1 tablespoon water

Table.Title: Fish /c Crab Meat
Table.Ingredients:
1 egg 1 heaping tablespoon mayo 1 tablespoon dry mustard 1/2 teaspoon fine ground pepper 1/4 teaspoon calylenne 1 teaspoon Old Bay 3 tablespoons parsley 1 pound backfin/claw crab meat 1 1/2 pounds fish (whiate fish fillets) Tempura Batter 2 cups bisquick 1 3/4 cup ice water
2-3 cups veg oil for frying warm lemon wedges for garnish
Table.Directions:
Line baking sheet with wax paper/ nonstick foil wrap - arrange fillets on baking sheet
Combine : egg, mustard, pepper old bay, cayenne & parsley Add to a large bowl : egg mixture to crab meat- gently mix - careful not to break up lumps
Top crab mixture on fillets 1/4" high - place baking sheet in freezer unti fish & crab mixture are stiff - about 45 minutes
Pour oil in heavy skillet - depth of 1" and heat till very hot
Dip fish in batter and fry for 2-3 minutes until golden
Remove to paper towel to drain - keep warm till all fish is ready

Table.Title: Chocolate Pretzels Dessert
Table.Ingredients: 2-3 sleeves of Saltine crackers 2 12oz. bags of semi-sweet chocolate chips 1 1/2 cups chopped walnuts 3 sticks of butter 1 1/2 cup sugar 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla
Table.Directions:
Pre heat oven 325F line 2 cookie sheets with nonstick/reg foil fill cookie sheets with crackers
Cook - bring to a boil - 3 minutes sugar and butter remove from stove
Add - vanilla
Pour over saltines - place in oven & cook 6-8 minutes
Remove - Cool 2 minutes - spread chocolate chips over mixture (will melt as they sit) (1bag /pan) Add walnuts- press into chocolate
Bake 2 minutes longer Remove from oven let cool Break into cracker size(some will be pieces) -Serve
Best kept in refrigerator/ air tight container - will get soggy if left out

Table.Title: Cream Cheese Icing
Table.Ingredients: 8 oz. cream cheese 1/2 cup butter 16 oz. 10x sugar 1 cup cool whip
Table.Directions:
beat: cheese & butter
add: 10 x sugar
Whisk: cool whip

Table.Title: Herb/Sausage Stuffing
Table.Ingredients: 12 cups dry unseasoned bread crumbs (2-3 bags) 2 sticks butter 1 cup chopped onion 2 cups chopped celery 4 cups chicken broth 1/2 teaspoon black pepper 2 eggs beaten/ bag 1 pound Savory sausage browned and drained
Table.Directions:
meflt butter in frying pan
cook onion & celery for 5 minutes
Large bowl: mix eggs, sausage, celery, onions and bread crumbs
Add chicken broth till moisten
cook 375 for 30 minutes poultry seasoning
Can add: 1 1/2 teaspoon poultry seasoning & 2 teaspoons thyme

Table.Title: Hershey Dark Chocolate Cake
Table.Ingredients: 1 3/4 cups flour 2 cups sugar 3/4 cup cocoa 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda 1 teaspon salt 2 eggs 1 cup milk 1/2 cup veg. oil 2 teaspoon vanilla 1 cup boiling water
Table.Directions:
Pre heat over 350F Grease & flour (baking spray) 9 x 13 pan
combine all dry ingredienats in large bowl
add: eggs, milk, oil & vanilla
beat 2 minutes
stir in boiling water - batter will be thin
pour into pan
bake 35-40 minutes until cake tester comes out clean
Frost

Table.Title: Memere/Trudie Chicken Casserole
Table.Ingredients: 6 boneless chicken breast (cut in half/thirds) 6 slices swiss cheese 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 cup chicken broth (or 2 bouillon cubes dissolved) 1 pkg Pepperidge Farm herb stufffing 1 stick butter
Table.Directions:
Bake 350 1-1 1/2 hour ( IF DOUBLED/TRIPLED, allow 2-3 hours)
Arrange chicken in greased pan
layer cheese over chicken
blend soups - pour over cheese
Can be covered and refrigerated (over night or 1 day)
Spread stuffing over chicken:
Melt butter and drizzle over stuffing
Bake

Table.Title: Pasta E Fagioli soup low fat/salt (veg)
Table.Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 tablespoon Mrs. Dash Garlic & Herb seasoning blend 1 tablespoon Mrs. Dash Tomato Basil Garlic blend 2 tablespoon no salt tomato paste 1 15oz can chopped tomatoes (no salt plum) 6 cups low sodium chicken broth 1 28oz can cannelloni beans, drained & rinsed 1 cup small elbow pasta, uncooked 1/4 cup parmesan cheese grated (garnish)
Table.Directions:
In a heavy sauce pan heat olive oil over medium heat
Add: blends, (I will saute these for a min or 2) then add: tomatoes, paste, chicken broth & beans - bring to a boil, reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes
Add: pasta and cook for another 10-15 minutes
serve garnished with cheese (I prefer the shredded parm)

Table.Title: Orange Jello
Table.Ingredients:
3 - .3oz boxs sugar free orange jello 20 oz. crush pineapple in light syrup (Dole is chunkier) 15 oz. mandarin orange segments light syrup drained(2 small cans work)
TOPPING 1 - 1oz box instant vanilla sugar free/fat free pudding 1 cup skim milk 8 oz. cool whip free
Table.Directions:
11 x 13 pan
Mix: oranges segments and pineapple(undrain) in pan
Boil: 3 cups of water Add: orange jello and stir to melt Pour over fruit and refrigerate till hard.
Topping
BEAT: milk with pudding ADD: cool whip SPREAD: over jello Serve

Table.Title: VEG Grilled Sweet Potatoes
Table.Ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes (1-1/2 pounds) 1 teaspoon ground ginger 1 teaspoon papirka 1/4 cup pinapple 1 tablesppon olive oil 1/2 teaspoon rum or vanilla extract
Table.Directions:
2 qrt pot of boiling water
Cut unpeeled potatoes into 1/2 inch thick strips diagonally. boil until tender (soft enough to pierce with a fork) 5-7 minutes
Drain Well
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl - potatoes can be marinated
Cook over medium heat 10-15 minutes - until soft in center- continue to brush with marinade
9g sugar, 3.5g fat, 37g carbohydrates, 3g protein

Table.Title: CHICKEN FLORENTINE Quick
Table.Ingredients: 6 boneless chix breast 2- 3 boxes frozen cream spinach - cooked according to directions sprinkle of garlic powder 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/4 cup + 2 T flour (6 tablespoons total) black pepper salt enough oil to cover bottom of pan TOPPING 16 oz. light cream (fat free 1/2 & 1/2) 16 oz. shredded swiss chesse 1/4 cup melted butter (1stick) 1 cup butter (2 sticks) 1/2 to 1 cup plain bread crumbs
Table.Directions:
Preheat oven 350 Heat small of oil in frying pan Spray 9 x 13 pan with baking spray
Dredge chicken in 1/4 cup flour, salt & pepper Brown in oil (3-4 minutes/side) Drain on paper towel
Place cooked spinach on bottom of baking pan - sprinkel with a touch of garlic powder Place browned chicken on top
TOPPING: Melt 1 stick of butter in a sauce pan add four to brown - add cream & cayenne pepper stir till thicken - add cheese - stir till melted - pour on tip of chicken Melt 2 sticks of butter - add- bread crumbs to (desired consistency) brown - sprinkle on top of sauce
Bake for 25-35 minutes - till bubbly & sauce is light brown

Table.Title: Chicken Florentine
Table.Ingredients:
12 Chicken Breast – Browned 3 pounds of fresh spinach 3 sticks butter 1 cup flour 2 chicken bouillons 2 pounds shredded swiss cheese 32 + table cream (1/2 & 1/2)
4 cups plain bread crumbs Bake 350 Heat small amt. of oil in frying pan Ex-large baking disk
Table.Directions:
Dredge chicken in flour with salt, pepper & paprika
Brown on high quickly (3-4 minutes/side)- drain on paper towel
Cook spinach with salt, pepper, garlic powder - drain well
Melt 8oz. butter- add- 8oz. flour -stir-till browned- add- 4 cups milk & bouillon-stir-till thicken - mix in spinach - transfer into 15 x 17 ex-large baking pan sprayed with Pam
Place chicken on top of spinach
Melt swiss cheese with cream - pour over chicken
Melt 2 sticks of butter - add bread crumbs - sprinkle over cheese sauce
Bake 350 30-40 minutes - until heated through
Can place under broiled to get bread crumbs to brown

Table.Title: Turtle Donuts
Table.Ingredients: A bunch of turtles 1 cup flour 3 lbs sugar
Table.Directions: Kill turtles Remove turtles from shell and discard meat Chop shells into cubes and purée Mix in sugar and flour to the purée Roll into 1" balls Serve cold
